Reviews.Title: Like a galaxy phone without an out of this world price
Reviews.Author: Ondadawg
Reviews.Content: Only have this for two days but boy, it sure works and looks well. Cannot say I'm disappointed. In fact, I am almost blown away by the fact that for the price, it performs so well and I am a tech lover. Only thing I didn't like was that the charging port is on top so I took off 1 star. So the missing star is for cosmetics,  but would give 5 stars for functionality. I ordered a 5.3 s. Can't wait to get it.

Reviews.Title: BLU Studio 5.0 S D570i Unlocked Dual Sim Phone.
Reviews.Author: CRM
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! Arrived very quickly on Amazon and was much cheaper than Walmart. It was hassle free to order and get delivered. (Ordered it on a Tuesday, got it Friday that same week) and it's not too hard to learn how to use. Other revews were right, the manual is not much help, but you can use your common sense to know what the icons on the top of the screen mean on the phone. I have mine working on only ONE Sim card and the speed is fine. The phone came clean and the battery came OUTSIDE the phone so you have to put that yourself. One thing that does scare me about the phone is that the back cover of the phone is quite tough to get off because its so thick and I was afraid to break it, But it's easy once you get the hang of it. I love my phone, and I totally recommend it to anyone looking for a great quality Android smartphone but don't wanna pay the price for it!

Reviews.Title: Best big-screen phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Kathy Freund
Reviews.Content: I got the Studio 5.0s about 3 months ago and I love it.  It is not a top-tier super fast phone, but it is not supposed to be. For $200 it runs fast on wifi or H/3G (I have it on straight talk), hold and runs as many apps and games as you want it to, and has a big, bright, sharp screen. I use it effectively for social networking, watching videos, reading and testing the mobile versions of websites I build. Great alternative to the $600 options out there if you are not looking to pay for the name.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I switched from a windows phone and wanted something close to a galaxy phone that was unlocked. It works on straight talk with 3g but shows as H so probably a hybrid (not 100% just guessing) since the sim is using both 2g and 3g.The sim card slots are labeled so if you want 3g use the one labeled 2g/3g. Call quality is good the only down side is the charge time for the battery. To sort of deal with that get a battery charging app that will somewhat speed up the charging but not by much. No phone cases for it yet just the gel one that comes with it.Overall its a decent phone for the price. You may have too explain that this phone isn't a galaxy phone to your friends because they won't believe it at first glance.

Reviews.Title: Nice product.
Reviews.Author: mallikarjunudu chittari
Reviews.Content: Nice product and does everything that of a same range branded smart phone does.Good phone for those who don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on branded phones.NOTE: once you buy it, You need to take wireless system update for better battery performance.Pros: 1) sleek design and light weight 2) Performance fast 3) high resolutionCons:low quality speaker

Reviews.Title: BLU STUDIO 5.0 S D570i
Reviews.Author: Andrew Taormina "taoand"
Reviews.Content: This has been a very good purchase! I have waited to leave a review to see the outcome of this phone. Now all I can say is: GREAT PHONE !!! I love it! I recommend it to anyone.Bye bye galaxy 4, I have saved a bundle and I have a phone just as good and capable.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE NICE MATCH FOR SAMSUNG 1/2 PRICE
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, can't complain its very close or just as good as Samsung's original version.  Pretty accurate with everything.  I love the DUAL SIM card since I live in San Diego and cross over the Mexico border, and my phone is fully unlocked it can pick up International companies (purchase a Tel Cel Sim card) it works or just use my ATT GoPhone Sim Card works too.CON ~ hard to find a gel cover or any protective cover for my phone since the size is slightly different than the Samsung.  Any suggestions, BLU or Vendor?  Thanks in advance.

Reviews.Title: CT Miami LLC told me the REFURBISHED phones are the same quality as the new handsets. But thats not the case at all.
Reviews.Author: Francisco Luna
Reviews.Content: Nice phone but the camera is horrible. Must be in super bright area(s) to get decent quality pictures. 720HD video recording is horrible. CT Miami LLC told me the REFURBISHED phones are the same quality as the new handsets. The refurbished phone I received had scuffs all over the bezel, a missing sdcard slot door and 3 half inch scratches on the screen (didn't notice them until I removed the factory screen protector).

Reviews.Title: COOL........BUT......
Reviews.Author: Cool105
Reviews.Content: I'm quite satisfied with all the features of this phone.  Very affordable.  My only gripe is the lack of accessory options.  I just recently found a silicone case for this phone after months of trial and error.

Reviews.Title: Wrong version still worked fantastic
Reviews.Author: Keith M Perry
Reviews.Content: I got the "i" version instead of the "a".  It still worked ok on T-mobile; well enough that I was able to skype for 2 hours straight in a rural area so that my sister could virtually attend my dad's funeral (this was an emergency purchase as my prior phone passed at the same time as my dad).  Screen is fantastic, phone is robust...all in all great.I'm tempted to give 4 stars as I fobbed it off on my son, and it has developed a defect where it turns off for an hour, then turns back on.  Very odd.  It isn't the sim, the battery, powersupply, static...so I'm at a loss.  Probably a bad memory chip, or the voltage regulator is going.  That being said, it has survived 6 months in my son's saggy jeans, and I really can't ding the phone for that.Basically, this is a Samsung Galaxy for 1/4 the price.

Reviews.Title: Not worth your time!
Reviews.Author: Felix C. Eneh "Galaxy"
Reviews.Content: This phone design may seem a perfect copy of the Galaxy series, in terms of accessories, features, and everything that smart phones offer, it's a great joke. It's a worthless piece of junk, which explains why it's so cheap. Avoid cheap "smart" phones. I wasted my money on this one, but I don't feel that bad about it. At least, I now know that Blu phones are the very worst out there. Therefore, I advise you to put your money into something else or simply wait until you're able to afford a real smart phone, such as the Sony Xperia series.For the hassles it put me through, I give it a star. Honestly, it deserves a cracked star.

Reviews.Title: IF
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: If you are a person that uses your data for pic messages consider this. The phone has a 300kb limit on pic size. The device also has a screen that times out quickly you can however resolve this by downloading an app that allows you to control when the screen times out. The built in one will not do it. I installed Screen timeout found in Google Play.

Reviews.Author: nay
Reviews.Content: FIRST OFF. THE SERVICE WAS PERFECT.!! THANK YOU Buuuut, there are some things I don't really like about the phone. I Still kept it though.  Is there ANY way that I can get another pair of BLU STUDIO heaphones AND BLU studio CHARGER ??? PLEEEEEASEOne is busted and I lost my charger.....

Reviews.Title: Great phone without any problem!
Reviews.Author: tornike
Reviews.Content: Very good phone! I bought it and i was very glad!This is definitely a high quality product! I love it!

Reviews.Title: Cool, and inexpensive.
Reviews.Author: GiantChickenOfDoom
Reviews.Content: Incredible performance for the price. Nice huge screen. All the bells and whistles of an expensive phone, plus dual-SIM's and a microSD slot.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: The cellphone come with a cover, screen protector, 1 battery, the charg... i was surprised.At the beginning the cell phone screen was flickering and the cellphone wouldn't turn off. I even had to ask for a refund but then it suddenly started working and wouldn't show any problems after updating the system. Works great now.A tip: If the cellphone after updated continue flickering, then this cellphone maybe has some problem with the brightness, so don't set it in automatic, better set it by yourself and the problem will solve. In my case this was the solve.

Reviews.Title: the phone has a problem.
Reviews.Author: luis rojas
Reviews.Content: hello, greetings when I connect the phone to the pc goes crazy. what is the solution to this problem? I hope your answer

Reviews.Title: Couldn't use it,was broken out of the box
Reviews.Author: Kasper Larsen
Reviews.Content: When I got this phone the screen would just flicker and erratically jump between landscape/vertical view when trying to use the phone horizontally. Not very impressive, I obviously returned it.Processor also seemed a tad slow, even for the price.

Reviews.Title: Dont like the touch of this phone
Reviews.Author: Pedro Jimenez
Reviews.Content: The touch on the screen is not precise. Sometime you touch one icon for an application, and then another application not the one you touched starts up... Beside this the phone is very good, and i like the 2 sim feature. this is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Isha Santos
Reviews.Content: It is the best thing that I have been able to buy. It works beautifully. Very much hesitate to buy it, but it was really the best buy I could do.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: gigolo
Reviews.Content: its a great phone, got 4 of them and all of them are working with different carriers...att, t-mobile, claro, orange, tim, wind,.....all over the world. a great phone for the price, equal or better than a samsung galaxy 4, and better looking than a Iphone.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy the "i"
Reviews.Author: jasrhr
Reviews.Content: Don't buy the "I" version of this phone if u plan to use att sim. Purchase the "a" version. Otherwise a great phone. I sent my 570i back when it would not work and purchased the larger 5.3 blu. It worked great and came with a snap on case and screen protector.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Dual SIM, 4GB storage; Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean), Micro SD up to 32GB; 3G HSPA 850/2100
5.0" IPS Display: qHD (540x960)
8MP Camera with LED Flash with HD recording (720p), 2MP Front Camera for Video Calling and instant self portraits.
3.5mm Audio Jack,FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
BLU Next Lens Technology: "One Glass Solution"
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Studio 5.0 S D570i Unlocked Dual Sim Phone with Quad-Core 1.2GHz Processor, Android 4.1 JB, 5.0-inch IPS High Resolution Display, and 8MP Camera (White)
